DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , crossover , randomize trial evaluate plasma composition load dose sterofundin solution give healthy volunteer resuscitation manner compare normal saline solution .
DOC.brief_title: Change Serum Chloride Level After Loading Dose Sterofundin Solution Compared With Normal Saline Solution
DOC.detailed_description: 10 healthy volunteer randomly assign receive either normal saline sterofundin first solution dose 30 mL/kg ( max 2 L ) 1 hour . Blood collect baseline ( T0 ) , 60 minute ( T1 ) , 120 minute ( T2 ) , 240 minute ( T4 ) baseline . Time fist void initiation fluid urine volume also record . After wash-out period least 1 week , crossover study perform another fluid .
DOC.criteria: No underlying disease LVEF > 0.5 No current medication usage Pregnancy lactation BMI < 18 > 25 Fever present past 2 week
